properties.name: simplix.tree-repository.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SimpliX tree repository functionality. When enabled, provides JdbcTemplate and tree repository configuration support. Use @EnableSimplixTreeRepositories annotation to activate tree repositories in your application.

properties.name: simplix.date-time.default-timezone
properties.description: Default timezone for the application. This will be used when timezone information is not available. Falls back to spring.jackson.time-zone, then user.timezone system property, then system default timezone. Example: 'Asia/Seoul', 'UTC', 'America/New_York'

properties.name: simplix.date-time.use-utc-for-database
properties.description: Whether to use UTC for database operations. When true, all OffsetDateTime values are converted to UTC before saving to database and converted back to application timezone when reading.

properties.name: simplix.date-time.normalize-timezone
properties.description: Whether to normalize timezone-less datetime values to application timezone. When true, LocalDateTime values are assumed to be in application timezone and converted to OffsetDateTime automatically.

values.description: Enable SimpliX tree repository functionality with @EnableSimplixTreeRepositories
